sire.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used when speaking to a king
sire.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the father of a four-legged animal, especially a horse
sire.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to be the father of an animal, especially a horse or dog
sire.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: a stallion that has sired several race winners
sire.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to be the father of a child
